detail_desc: Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck in a slightly shorter, boxy fit with a straight hem. Long raglan sleeves with block-coloured sections.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Nursing blouse in woven fabric with lace details, pin-tucks at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Double-layered with an inner top for easier nursing access.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with a metal decoration at the front and an elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back. Width 2 cm.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and ties at the front of the hem.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringing along the edges.
V-neck top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Bootees in soft fabric with ribbing at the top and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with inset lace sections at the back and wide lace trims at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Reversible, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to created a fitted silhouette.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details.
Mules with pointed toes and a decorative knot detail at the front. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and slits at the sides. Unlined.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with appliqués and embroidery. Fleece-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, handwarmer pockets with a concealed zip and large, fleece-lined front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastener. The front pockets also conceal two fleece-lined side pockets. Adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

High-waisted shorts in imitation leather with pleats at the top and wide belt loops at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft, lightly brushed inside..
Long nightshirt in a patterned viscose weave with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.

Long, flared dress in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar decorated with a large bow at the front, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust and a seam lower down the skirt with decorative gathers. Lined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a wide waistband and straight legs with a gentle flare at the hems.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sleeveless maxi dress in satin with a V-neck front and back, a decorative metal ring at the shoulders and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Blouse in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, lace yoke, small lace frill at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust.

Short wrap dress in woven fabric with short, wide sleeves and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounced trim. Unlined.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.

Long kaftan in a crinkled weave with a slight sheen. V-neck and gathered seams under the bust and at the back to create a gentle draping effect. Short, wide sleeves that are open at the top, and a rounded hem. Lined.

Straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in soft, supple leather with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, large front pockets, extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with buttons down the front, narrow, detachable ties under the bust and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Joggers in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, side pockets and welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Jersey T-shirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and narrow trim around the neckline.
Oversized jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in woven fabric with lightly padded shoulders, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and front pockets. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Skirt in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, wide top in jersey with embroidered details, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh detail at the top. Narrow shoulder straps, narrow crossover straps at the back and an elastic hem. Light support.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Lined. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a text print on the side and soles. Padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a faux fur-trimmed padded hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Zipped handwarmer pockets, front pockets with a press-stud, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a round buckle decorated with rhinestones. Width approx. 3 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length trousers in airy viscose jersey with a high waist, and straight, wide legs.
Scarf in an airy, patterned cotton weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 25x200 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sleeveless dress with a bodice in an organic cotton weave with support panels and decorative seams, and a long, pleated skirt in three layers of Econyl® tulle. Concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey crêpe with lace at the top and front.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and wide, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides and a high cut at the back.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, appliqués and a motif. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with notch lapels, a diagonal zip down the front and a zipped chest pocket. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, a gently tapered waist and an asymmetric hem.
